body: Creatures with the agile template are quick and deadly, moving faster than their normal counterparts and striking with incredible speed and agility. An agile creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
name: Agile (MR 1, CR +1)
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Agile (MR 1/CR +1)

sections.body: Init +20 bonus; AC +2 dodge bonus; hp mythic bonus hit points; Defensive Abilities evasion (as the rogue class feature); Speed +30 feet for all movement types (up to double the creature's base movement speed); Special Attacks dual initiative.
